SEARCH
Package a2

Class Waltz

java.lang.Object
a2.Waltz
public class Waltz extends Object
Provides methods for computing a musical waltz by randomly combining short precomposed musical fragments using a pair of 6-sided dice.

The waltz is composed of a minuet sequence followed by a trio sequence. The minuet sequence is composed of MINUET_SEQUENCE_LENGTH randomly chosen minuet fragments. Similarly, the trio sequence is composed of TRIO_SEQUENCE_LENGTH randomly chosen trio fragments.

Recordings for each precomposed musical fragment are available for the instruments listed in the array INSTRUMENTS.

  • Method Details

    • toPathname

      public static String toPathname(String filename)
      Returns the full pathname for the musical fragment specified by filename.

      For minuets, filename is assumed to have the form instrument/minueti-s where instrument is the name of an instrument found in INSTRUMENTS, i is the position of the fragment in the sequence, and s is the sum obtained by rolling two standard 6-sided dice.

      For trios, filename is assumed to have the form instrument/trioi-v where instrument is the name of an instrument found in INSTRUMENTS, i is the position of the fragment in the trio and v is the value obtained by rolling one standard 6-sided dice.

      Parameters:
      filename - the name of a minuet or trio fragment as specified above
      Returns:
      the full pathname to the audio file for the fragment

    • roll

      public static int roll(int n)
      Returns the sum of rolling n standard 6-sided dice. The returned sum is a random integer value between n and 6n, inclusive. Returns 0 if n <= 0.
      Parameters:
      n - the number of 6-sided dice
      Returns:
      the sum of rolling n standard 6-sided dice

    • hasInstrument

      public static boolean hasInstrument(String instrument)
      Returns true if instrument is equal to a string in INSTRUMENTS, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      instrument - the name of a musical instrument
      Returns:
      true if instrument is equal to a string in INSTRUMENTS, false otherwise

    • makeMinuet

      public static String[] makeMinuet(String instrument)
      Returns an array of length MINUET_SEQUENCE_LENGTH where each element is the name of a randomly chosen minuet musical fragment for the specified instrument.
      Parameters:
      instrument - the name of instrument
      Returns:
      an array of length MINUET_SEQUENCE_LENGTH where each element is the name of a randomly chosen minuet musical fragment for the specified instrument.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if instrument is not equal to a string in INSTRUMENTS

      Returns:
